website_summaries.verdict: While it's far from cheap, the upgrades made to Huawei's MateBook X Pro make it a potent Windows 10 ultraportable.
pros: Large screen for an under-3-pound laptop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant bit of kit, had no issues in the year or so I've had it. The screen is excellent, as is the battery life. Has enough power for the odd bit of HD video editing and photo editing, but I don't do much of that really. I also love the size (I forget the exact size but its between 14" and 15" I think?)... a 13.5" would feel too small and a 15" would start feeling too big to me. Perfect size for carrying around and the narrow screen bezel makes it feel larger than it really is. Great bit of kit overall and I often get questions about it. Always recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cjoakley

customer_reviews.title: Boots up in 5 seconds
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the speed of this laptop. From being powered off to being logged in and google up infront of me, it takes around 5-6 seconds. I hold my finger down on the power button and whilst it boots up it reads my fingerprint and logs me in. The screen is stunning and at 100% brightness is unbelievably bright! It comes with an adapter so you can use external monitors and provides an extra usb port. Keyboard is very satisfying to type on. Overall a great laptop with everything you would need.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: very well made, super fast charging as well as very quiet while running
customer_reviews.text: think apple but cheaper and in many ways better. the super fast charging and lack of fan noise is amazing. i have had many mac's over the years and this laptop far out preforms them. the design is lovely the finger print reader so far has worked every time. the battery life is amazing and the overall speed of the laptop is excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I had never splashed out before so went for the top end & it was worth it. Great laptop (I just use internet & MS Office). The touch screen is brilliant, works perfectly (I just use my finger). The battery lasts ages & doesn't take long to charge. Works at almost full speed off my mobile phone hot-spot. Everything about this laptop just works, highly recommend if you are splashing out.

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal laptop to say the least!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this laptop for just over 5 months and I have to say it's a very good laptop. I use to for uni work and it handles that just fine with no issues. The display is amazing especially because it has very slim bezzles. I never hear the fans when using it which is always good especially when studying at a quiet place like a library. The battery life lasts me all day and it charges very quickly. The build of the laptop is top tier too, there really isn't much that's bad about it. :)
